title: Ep. - 285 - DIRECTOR OF CLASS ACTION PARK J.B. FROM MILLION DOLLAR BEACH HOUSE
description:
Director Seth Porges of Class Action Park, a documentary that chronicles Action Park, a wild water park in Vernon, New Jersey, as famous for its seemingly unregulated rides as it was for tragedies during an almost 20-year run from 1978 to 1996. Lying somewhere between Lord of the Flies and a Saw movie, Action Park is filled with home movies, archival footage, and interviews with former employees and park goers.

 

J.B. Andreassi from Netflix’s Million Dollar Beach House, which follows five real estate brokers who work for Nest Seekers, a New York firm that specializes in luxury homes in The Hamptons.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
